headline: Is DexCom (DXCM) Pricing Reflect Longer Term Returns And Glucose Monitoring Growth Story
summary: If you are wondering whether DexCom's current share price really reflects what you are getting for your money, you are not alone. The stock last closed at US$73.67, with returns of 4.2% over 7 days, 9.0% over 30 days, 10.7% year to date, and a 16.6% decline over the past year, as well as 31.2% and 25.3% declines over 3 and 5 years respectively. Recent news coverage has focused on DexCom's position as a major player in glucose monitoring technology and its role in longer term diabetes care...
